about_the_game:
Overview:

The dark and mysterious world of Milkman is yet to be uncovered. A chilling survival horror game that takes place in the beautiful Kellsworth Black Steel hotel. Play as Alanna Kellsworth, arriving at her yearly visit to the hotel to visit her brother in law, only to be shown the dark and nightmarish reality that lurks the hotel corridors.

  • First person Survival Horror game.
  • Explore the eerie and dark Kellsworth Hotel avoiding what lurks the hotel hallways.
  • Twisted monsters await your visit.
  • Uncover the dark and twisted reality of Milkman.

The Kellsworth Black Steel Hotel:

Welcome! Your stay at the magnificent Kellsworth hotel will be one you will never forget, from our beautifully lit lobby to the comfortable room you count sheep in, you will be treated like royalty. Your holiday away is so good you wish you could stay!

name: Milkman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G with Radeon Vega Graphics 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 710 , 1 GB | AMD Radeon R7 250, 1 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: A normal visit to your family hotel becomes a night you will never forget.
